Articles.Content: Problems with Remote Tech. I can not seem to launch/stage an unmanned craft....  I have a core. I have a connection. When I use the flight controls they work... just cant seem to launch? KSP ver 1.1.3 remote tech ver. 1.7.0

Are you sure you have connection? (is the little box green?) 

got a picture of your craft?

On 6/27/2016 at 8:14 PM, krj7709 said:

Problems with Remote Tech. I can not seem to launch/stage an unmanned craft....  I have a core. I have a connection. When I use the flight controls they work... just cant seem to launch? KSP ver 1.1.3 remote tech ver. 1.7.0

 I'm having the same problem.  The only thing i can tell you is to either disable remote tech or uninstall until it is updated
